description: Heavenly Wounded Star, Mandrake Fyodor is an extremely sadistic Specter, who has his own torture chamber in the depths of Yomotsu Hirasaka, the Hill to the Land of Spirits. He held Tenma captive until the Pegasus Saint was rescued by Yato and Yuzuriha, and then was slain by his former prisoner. Later he was resurrected by Hades. Fyodor is one of the Specters introduced in Lost Canvas and not present in the original manga.
name: Tenshousei Mandrake no Fyodor
